title: Air Defense Asset Management
description: An Air Defense Officer must allocate surface-to-air missile (SAM) systems to engage multiple incoming cruise missiles.

tasks.description: Identify all available SAM batteries and their current readiness status and missile inventory.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer has a clear picture of all available air defense assets.

tasks.description: Prioritize the incoming missile threats based on their trajectory towards high-value assets.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer correctly ranks the threats from most to least dangerous.

tasks.description: Assign specific SAM batteries to engage specific targets to maximize probability of kill and conserve ammunition.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer creates an optimal pairing of shooters to targets.
